attributes.additional_details:
Trying to force energy companies to act in the best interests of their customers has failed.
The day to day lives of millions of people in this country are being affected by the almost constant energy price increases.
For all those already experiencing fuel poverty, and for those who will slip into it with the latest rise, and the one's who will join them probably in the very near future, a debate needs to begin urgently.
Is our energy to important to be left in the hands of profit making, cartel pricing companies.
I say yes, Nationalise energy.
